title: It shall be the responsibility of the owner/NOC holder to ensure that the existing tenements/existing authorised uses are maintained
clause_text: It shall be the responsibility of the owner/NOC holder to ensure that the existing tenements/existing authorised uses are maintained. No repairs to the unauthorised structure/unauthorised part of structure shall be allowed.

source_pdf.text_snippet: It shall be the responsibility of the owner/NOC holder to ensure that the existing tenements/existing authorised uses are maintained.
